doc.p: This is a paragraph containing a ftp://eirikhanssen.com/dl/files.zip that has already been tagged as well as a doi uri: doi: 10.1093/intqhc/mzs023 that should be tagged as a uri element. As well as a loose hyperlink that should also be tagged as a uri, namely http://www.eirikhanssen.com/xsltworkbench
